accordion.fifth-entry-description: ExplorAI allows you to flexibly edit your travel agenda, giving you the freedom to move, include, or exclude destinations to create a travel itinerary that fits your personal tastes and schedule.
accordion.fifth-entry-title: How do I change my travel plans with ExplorAI?
accordion.first-entry-description: Imagine a dedicated travel consultant, easily accessible on your mobile device at any time. ExplorAI brings you exactly that: an intuitive platform to organize your trip effortlessly, providing tailor-made travel plans for free. Discover the convenience of simple, personalized travel planning. with a single click.
accordion.fourth-entry-description: Absolutely, ExplorAI allows you to save your travel arrangements as a PDF document, which you can retrieve and use at any time without the need for online connectivity.
accordion.fourth-entry-title: ExplorAI meticulously gathers recommendations tailored to your needs taking into account your tastes, interests and travel specifications, ensuring a personalized travel plan just for you.
accordion.second-entry-description: Indeed, ExplorAI is a free planning resource (currently at no cost ðŸ˜‰)

accordion.sixth-entry-title: How can I get help with ExplorAI?

cta.description: Start your hassle-free adventure with ExplorAI, your free guide to planning your trip effortlessly.

faq.first-entry-description: Enter your trip details such as destination, dates, budget and interests. The more specific you are, the more the AI can tailor your route to your preferences.
faq.second-entry-description: After submitting your details, our AI works to create your personalized itinerary. This involves analyzing a wide range of travel data to ensure the best match for your trip. You will be notified once your personalized plan is ready.
faq.third-entry-description: Review and customize the suggested itinerary. Make necessary changes to meet your needs, explore additional options, and save the final plan. Prepare to experience a trip specially tailored to your needs.
faq.title: How to use ExplorAI?

home.subtitle: TRAVEL HASSLE-FREE AND WORRY-FREE
